PRELOVED CERTIFIED STANDARD

Giving products a trusted second life.

Overview

Preloved Certified gives consumers confidence that pre-owned items are genuinely used, in good condition, and helping to reduce the impact of new manufacturing and material waste.

Eligible product systems include:

*Product material restrictions apply
